events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but received the wrong size and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily Johnson for handling the refund request.
Hello! I'm Emily from customer support. Iâ€™m sorry to hear you received the wrong jacket size. Let's get this sorted out for you.
Could you please provide your order number and whether the item has been returned or is still with you?
My order number is 789654321. The jacket is still here with me, unused and in the original packaging.
Thanks for that. We will initiate a full refund once the jacket is returned to us. I will send you a prepaid return label via email shortly.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for your excellent support and swift handling.
The case has been closed following successful refund confirmation and positive customer feedback.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their recent support experience.
